verses.text:
Now in the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, that the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* by the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* might be \w fulfilled|strong="H3615"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* stirred \w up|strong="H5782"\w* the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, that he made a \w proclamation|strong="H5674"\w* throughout all his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, and \add put it\add* also in \w writing|strong="H4385"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,  +  r 1.1  t made…: Heb. caused a voice to pass *

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; and he hath \w charged|strong="H6485"\w* me to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* him an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, which \add is\add* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

Who \add is there\add* among you of all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*? his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* be with him, and let him go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, which \add is\add* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, (he \add is\add* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w*,) which \add is\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And whosoever \w remaineth|strong="H7604"\w* in any \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where he \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w*, let the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of his \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w help|strong="H5375"\w* him with \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and with \w goods|strong="H7399"\w*, and with \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, beside the freewill \w offering|strong="H5071"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* that \add is\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 1.4 \ft help…: Heb. lift him up\f*

¶ Then rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, with all \add them\add* whose \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w raised|strong="H5782"\w*, to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which \add is\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And all they that \add were\add* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* them \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* with \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, with \w goods|strong="H7399"\w*, and with \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, and with precious \w things|strong="H4030"\w*, beside all \add that\add* was willingly \w offered|strong="H5068"\w*.\f + \fr 1.6 \ft strengthened…: that is, helped them\f*

¶ Also \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* had brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and had \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*;

Even those did \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Mithredath|strong="H4990"\w* the \w treasurer|strong="H1489"\w*, and \w numbered|strong="H5608"\w* them unto \w Sheshbazzar|strong="H8339"\w*, the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And this \add is\add* the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of them: \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w chargers|strong="H0105"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w chargers|strong="H0105"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w knives|strong="H4252"\w*,

\w Thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w basons|strong="H3713"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w basons|strong="H3713"\w* of a \w second|strong="H4932"\w* \add sort\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w ten|strong="H6235"\w*, \add and\add* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

All the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \add were\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*. All \add these\add* did \w Sheshbazzar|strong="H8339"\w* bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with \add them of\add* the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w* that were brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 1.11 \ft the captivity: Heb. the transportation\f*
